content: i swear to god, these anti-latinx fascists just cant seem to get it through their thick skulls that sending undocumented immigrants to concentration camps hurts documented immigrant families as well. do they think that undocumented people live in their own little conclaves, somehow separate from their legal family members? these people are integral members of our communities who serve important roles in local economies, as every sane American has been saying forever. the frothy anti-immigrant sentiment in America is cruel, spiteful, and expensive, for literally no reason but white feelings.
